result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald G Kalmon

defendant.name: Kalmon, Ronald G
defendant.address: N34 W23189 Capitol Dr, Pewaukee, WI 53072

records.addlTxt: Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant to have no contact with Victim A listed in the Criminal Complaint/Victim Identification Key.  Defendant is not to share, reproduce or distribute any personal and/or identifying information about the crime victim(s), except to their attorney.  Defendant is not to possess any dangerous weapons/firearms.  Defendant is not to have any firearms at all in his home or on his property.

8:44 AM Defendant Ronald G Kalmon in court.  Prosecuting attorney Alyssa M Jay in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint. Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties. Court advises of right to an attorney. Court conducts colloquy with the defendant in regards to counsel but the defendant wishes to proceed without counsel.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
Hearing scheduled for January 3, 2023 at 09:30 am.
To Seal Victim/Witness Identification Key, signed by Judge Michael O. Bohren on September 20, 2022.
Victim/Witness Identification Key filed, under seal, by the District Attorney's office.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection and Notice of Intent to Use Defendant's Statement and DNA Evidence.
records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor
